title: Association Football. Pt. 3. Coaching in the game
creator_credit: Gaumont-British Instructional, Football Association and George Sturt
brief_description: Instructional film looking at the skills involved in the game of football (soccer). Looks specifically at field positions and strategies of attack and defence. Commentary by Raymond Glendenning.
